Dubbo will clean the RpcContext in the method "after" in the org.apache.dubbo.rpc.cluster.interceptor.Consumer.ContextClusterInterceptor.after(AbstractClusterInvoker<?> clusterInvoker, Invocation invocation).As the following stack trace.
![dubbo#](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42060415/109209891-10ec3b80-77e7-11eb-800d-3e632e8b2f8f.jpg)
My dubbo version is 2.7.9.RELEASE,but I can also find the ContextClusterInterceptor with the after method in the 2.7.8 version

I think the main reason of the memory leak is that you use CompletableFuture.The RpcContext put the context in the threadLocal.So if the thread set context in the RpcContext is different from the thread which execute the invoke,the context in the threadLocal might be different.

> different

我也在2.7.8中找到了该组件,但是目前跟踪下来并未生效.
https://github.com/apache/dubbo/blob/24ca37bf0f40f2ab7d8331cccc07d5374f88680c/dubbo-cluster/src/main/java/org/apache/dubbo/rpc/cluster/interceptor/ClusterInterceptor.java#L29
我尝试使用dubbo的spi机制(在META-INF/dubbo中添加org.apache.dubbo.rpc.cluster.interceptor.ClusterInterceptor)启用该组件;仍未生效.
请问该组件[ContextClusterInterceptor]如何生效?

> I think the main reason of the memory leak is that you use CompletableFuture.The RpcContext put the context in the threadLocal.So if the thread set context in the RpcContext is different from the thread which execute the invoke,the context in the threadLocal might be different.

另外您说的清理threadlocal时在不同线程应该不大会;provider是在CompletableFuture中运行的;本质上还是一个单线程;

> My dubbo version is 2.7.9.RELEASE,but I can also find the ContextClusterInterceptor with the after method in the 2.7.8 version

我不知道是不是由于consumer绕过注册中心直连provider的导致该组件无效;接下来尝试一下使用注册中心的模式下是否有效

抱歉没有及时关掉这个issue，dubbo是没有问题的。

我重新看了一下我的demo，我在自定义的Router中使用RpcContext设置了consumer的tag，但此时Invocation对象已经生成，所以在TagRouter中是无法直接从Invocation对象中获取到attachments里的tag的，就造成了issue中提到的问题。

我最后的解决方法是在自定义的Router中使用invocation.setAttachment(CommonConstants.TAG_KEY, tag)的方式设置tag。

dubbo3 has not implemented the config center through the k8s.Maybe dubbo3 will implement the config center through the k8s.However,it seems not nesscessary to use the config center directly on k8s.Since the version 2.7.6,dubbo use Service Introspection(服务自省).One of the reason is decentralization(去中心化).The metadata is used to store in the registry before 2.7.4.Now dubbo provide a way to store the metadata in the provider,and one of the way for the consumer to get the metadata of providers is to use rpc to invoke the MetadataService of the providers.This way will reduce stress of the config center.However,using the MetadataService will stress the k8s much.It is recommented to use nacos or appolo as the config center in the production environment.

我总结了以下原因


> Now I check my dubbo to 2.7.8.RELEASE and I can still see the CosumerContextClusterInterceptor been invoked .Could you pls. provide a demo project?

后面我会提供一份demo(暂时休假)

我总结了一下原因

1. 不使用注册中心直连provider(此时cluster相关环节不会加入调用链**ConsumerContextClusterInterceptor**)
2. 调用provider的任务使用一个利用率不高的线程池(线程池中一个线程take到任务后;在接下来很长一段时间都可能不会在take到任务,而他的threadlocals会一直持有dubbo上一次的参数和返回值)

`@DubboReference`/`@Reference` is a combination of reference bean + injection, and then the reference bean is registered in the spring bean factory. The reference bean does not exist in the bean definition processing stage, and is registered to the Spring bean factory after `@DubboReference`/`@Reference` is processed. So those classes that were initialized before the reference bean was registered cannot find it. This design has some flaws and does not follow the spring bean life cycle.

We are currently refactoring the processing logic of DubboReference. The idea of ​​this PR is helpful to us, but we cannot merge directly.

此方案是在DubboBeanDefinitionParser中，使用environment.resolvePlaceholders解决一次placeholder，但此时PropertyPlaceholderConfigurer还没加载，可能导致xml配置解决结果不正确。
如当存在默认值的情况时，可能没有使用配置，而是使用默认值：
```xml
<bean id="propertyConfigurer" class="org.springframework.beans.factory.config.PropertyPlaceholderConfigurer">
    <property name="location">
        <value>app.properties</value>
    </property>
</bean>

<dubbo:registry address="${dubbo.registry.address:zookeeper://127.0.0.1:2182}"/>
```

app.properties:
```
dubbo.registry.address=zookeeper://127.0.0.1:2181?registry-type=service
```

上面的例子中，registry的address值为`zookeeper://127.0.0.1:2182`，属性没有正确注入。

**似乎应该使用PropertySourcesPlaceholderConfigurer来解决此问题，ctrip Apollo自动注册了这个bean：**
```java
    BeanRegistrationUtil.registerBeanDefinitionIfNotExists(registry, PropertySourcesPlaceholderConfigurer.class.getName(),
        PropertySourcesPlaceholderConfigurer.class, propertySourcesPlaceholderPropertyValues);
```
